version_description: We're continuing to make OnSong better with bug fixes and new features. Please check out the release notes for this version at: http://onsongapp.com/releases/1.9992
We're continuing to make OnSong better with bug fixes and new features. Please check out the release notes for this version at: http://onsongapp.com/releases/1.9992

Attention iPad 1 users: We can no longer test directly on an iPad 1 prior to release. Please hold off on updating until we can confirm proper function. Sign up for iPad 1 updates at http://onsongapp.com/ipad1/

This is a big release that supports an even bigger iPad – The iPad Pro! OnSong now supports the full size of the iPad Pro as well as many new iOS 9 features like large screen sizes, split-screen multitasking and integrated search. Print and export annotations and lock or assign actions to sticky notes. Improved lyrics projection and section handling. There are just too many improvements to list here so be sure to read the release notes at: http://onsongapp.com/releases/1.9993/

We're continuing to make awesome improvements to OnSong!

• Revamped Metronome with subdivisions
• Personalize the color of the menubar and live bar
• Improved drawings with orthogonal detection for drawing straight lines
• Integration with WorshipPlanning.com
• For full release notes, visit: http://onsongapp.com/releases/1.99993

We're continuing to make awesome improvements to OnSong!

• Revamped Metronome with subdivisions
• Personalize the color of the menubar and live bar
• Improved drawings with orthogonal detection for drawing straight lines
• Integration with WorshipPlanning.com
• For full release notes, visit: http://onsongapp.com/releases/1.99993

NOTE: You will need to sign into Dropbox again to continue to use Dropbox. Be sure you have your Dropbox login credentials ready!

We're continuing to make OnSong better with bug fixes and new features. We've improved the drawing tool, section scrolling and importing from Dropbox, Amazon S3, FTP and WebDAV. Please check out the release notes for this version at: http://onsongapp.com/releases/1.99994

NOTE: You will need to sign into Dropbox again to continue to use Dropbox. Be sure you have your Dropbox login credentials ready!

We've been busy taking OnSong to the next level with iOS 11 compatibility and new features like:
• iOS 11 drag and drop on iPad
• Google Drive integration
• Flic smart buttons
• Stage Lighting Console
• And much more... http://onsongapp.com/releases/1.99996

OnSong continues to bring you the features you've asked for. We plan to do this over time to allow you time to adapt interface changes. Too much change all at once can be a bad thing. Here are some of things we've improved in the latest version:

• Vertical Menu Mode gives you a split screen to view songs and settings while performing.
• The new songs menu and viewer work together to let you flip through any collection of songs like books, topics, search results, or set.
• The redesigned style preferences menu makes room for future formatting options and gives you more control over your chords.
• Lyrics projection gets some new bells and whistles by letting you set the color of text, stroke, and shadow.
• Lots more improvements and fixes too!

For full release notes, please visit: http://onsongapp.com/releases/2018.0

OnSong continues to bring you the features you've asked for. We plan to do this over time to allow you time to adapt interface changes. Too much change all at once can be a bad thing. Here are some of things we've improved in the latest version:

• Vertical Menu Mode gives you a split screen to view songs and settings while performing.
• The new songs menu and viewer work together to let you flip through any collection of songs like books, topics, search results, or set.
• The redesigned style preferences menu makes room for future formatting options and gives you more control over your chords.
• Lyrics projection gets some new bells and whistles by letting you set the color of text, stroke, and shadow.
• Lots more improvements and fixes too!

For full release notes, please visit: http://onsongapp.com/releases/2018.0

We're rounding out the year with one last build for 2018. Here's what's new:

• Redesigned the actions menu with more than 100 easy to navigate actions.
• Support for newer ChordPro section tags such as start_of_verse and start_of_part.
• Updates to the visual metronome and tapping tempos.

Read the release notes to get the full details of what we've added, changed, and fixed: http://onsongapp.com/releases/2018.6

We've added two major features for musicians to reach their audiences online during this global pandemic.

Live Video: Stream live from your camera while you perform with lyrics with video effects for an engaging performance.
Broadcasting: Shares your OnSong screen to popular video conferencing apps for easy virtual concerts and online lessons.

We've made a few more updates and fixes available too. For full release notes, please visit: http://onsongapp.com/releases/2020.4
